column4: men-u Healthy Hair & Scalp Shampoo - Imported
column13:
men-u Healthy Hair & Scalp Shampoo - Imported (101 ml) Price: Rs.2600

men-u Healthy Hair & Scalp Shampoo. An ideal cleanser and refresher for your hair and scalp. Removes sweat salt chlorine and styling products. It s also great for flaky itchy scalp because of the ingredient octopirox. Most men who think they have dandruff actually don t. Most dry flaky scalp is a result of the male hormone androgen. Dandruff is completely different - it is associated with bacteria and greasy oily hair. So using a an anti-dandruff shampoo when you don t have dandruff makes the problem worse! We have had phenomenal results with this men-u shampoo with men who previously had dry flaky scalp. this is an excellent scalp treatment for guys who shave their heads. Delivers up to 120 shampoos. Compact size and locking top ideal for travel the locker room or limited bathroom space. TSA approved for carry on luggage (3. 4oz now allowed!) as are all men-u products. Cruelty Free Vegan. Like all men-u products contains No animal ingredients and never tested on animals.
